pullRequest.title: Script for finding groups inconsistencies
pullRequest.bodyText:
In perun db was created new script find_groups_inconsistencies,
which checks wheter there are groups with some relationship where
subgroup contains a member which does not exists in the parent group as
Indirect.

commit.message:
Script for finding groups inconsistencies

- In perun db was created new script find_groups_inconsistencies,
  which checks wheter there are groups with some relationship where
  subgroup contains a member which does not exists in the parent group as
  Indirect.
- In order to use the scrip, following commnads need to be executed on
  machine:
  apt install libdbi-perl
  apt install libdbd-pg-perl
